metadata.titleEn: Dataset for spatio-temporal distribution of artificial radioiodine in the Tibet Plateau (2018-2021)
metadata.titleCn: 高原地区人工放射性核素的时间序列和空间分布数据集（2018-2021）
metadata.description: This data set is mainly used to collect data such as 129I/127I ratio, uncertainty of 129I/127I ratio, atomic concentration of 129I, uncertainty of atomic concentration of 129I, radioactivity of 129I, uncertainty of radioactivity of 129I, mass concentration of 127I, uncertainty of mass concentration of 127I, etc. in lake water, plants, topsoil and total suspended particulate samples in Tibet and Qinghai. The data set contains 4 data tables and 77 records, It is obtained by pretreatment of the collected samples and measurement of accelerator mass spectrometry. In terms of sample analysis, the analysis procedures determined by the study are strictly followed, and the analysis procedures and methods of each nuclide are proven and reliable. Radionuclides are analyzed according to the steps required by the ISO Laboratory and Analytical Methods Certification Procedure, with traceability of any steps, data and results and integrity of records。
metadata.descriptionCn: 本数据集主要针对采集自西藏、青海地区的湖水、植物、表土及总悬浮颗粒样品中129I/127I比值、129I/127I比值不确定度、129I原子浓度、129I原子浓度不确定度、129I放射性活度、129I放射性活度不确定度、127I质量浓度、127I质量浓度不确定度等数据，本数据集共包含4个数据表，77条记录，通过对采集的样品经过前处理以及加速器质谱测量获得。在样品分析方面，严格按照研究确定的分析流程进行，每个核素的分析流程和方法均是经过验证的可靠的分析方法。根据ISO实验室和分析方法认证程序要求的步骤对放射性核素进行分析，做到任何步骤、数据和结果的可溯源性和记录的完整性。

authorList.unitEn: Institute of Earth Environment, Chinese Academy of Sciences
authorList.unitCn: 中国科学院地球环境研究所

literatureList.titleEn: A 60-year record of 129I in Taal Lake sediments (Philippines): Influence of human nuclear activities at low latitude region

literatureList.titleEn: Level and source of 129I of environmental samples in Xi’an region
literatureList.referenceEn: Zhang, L., Zhou, W.J., Hou, X., Chen, N., Liu, Q., He, C., Fan, Y., Luo, M., Wang, Z., & Fu, Y. (2011). Level and source of 129I of environmental samples in Xi’an region, China. Science of the Total Environment, 409, 3780–3788. https://doi.org/10.1016/j.scitotenv.2011.06.007

literatureList.titleEn: Determination of 129I in aerosols using pyrolysis and AgI–AgCl coprecipitation separation and accelerator mass spectrometry measurements
literatureList.referenceEn: Zhang, L., Hou, X., Fu, Y., Fang, M., & Chen, N. (2018). Determination of 129I in aerosols using pyrolysis and AgI–AgCl coprecipitation separation and accelerator mass spectrometry measurements. Journal of Analytical Atomic Spectrometry, 33, 1729–1736. https://doi.org/10.1039/C8JA00248G

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What are the characteristics and properties of time series and spatial distribution data for artificial radionuclides in high-altitude regions?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 高海拔地区人工放射性核素的时间序列和空间分布数据的特征和属性是什么？
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: ratios of 129I/127I, uncertainties, atomic concentrations, radioactive activities, mass concentrations of 127I
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 129I/127I 比率，不确定性，原子浓度，放射性活度，127I 的质量浓度

Quantification.QuestionEn: How many records are included in a dataset focusing on the time series and spatial distribution of anthropogenic radioactive nuclides in the plateau region?
Quantification.QuestionCn: 该数据集中包含多少条记录，专注于高原地区人类活动产生的放射性核素的时间序列和空间分布？

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What factors might influence the accuracy and reliability of time series and spatial distribution data of artificial radionuclides collected from high-altitude regions like Tibet and Qinghai?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 影响从高海拔地区（如西藏和青海）收集的人工放射性核素时间序列和空间分布数据的准确性和可靠性的因素有哪些？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: The accuracy and reliability of data on artificial radionuclides in high-altitude regions could be influenced by the rigor of pre-treatment processes, the precision of accelerator mass spectrometry measurements, the validation of analytical methods, and adherence to ISO laboratory certification and analytical method accreditation procedures to ensure traceability and completeness of records.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 高海拔地区人工放射性核素数据的准确性和可靠性可能受到预处理过程的严格性、加速器质谱测量的精确性、分析方法的验证以及遵循ISO实验室认证和分析方法认可程序的影响，以确保可追溯性和记录的完整性。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: What is the ultimate goal of collecting time series and spatial distribution data of artificial radionuclides in high-altitude regions such as Tibet and Qinghai?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 收集高海拔地区（如西藏和青海）人工放射性核素的时间序列和空间分布数据的最终目标是什么？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: The objective is to obtain reliable and traceable data regarding the ratios and concentrations of radionuclides, specifically 129I/127I, in environmental samples such as lake water, plants, surface soil, and total suspended particles. This involves ensuring the accuracy and completeness of data through validated analytical methods and adherence to ISO-certified procedures, which facilitate a comprehensive understanding of radionuclide distribution and its potential environmental impacts in these high-altitude regions.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 目标是获得关于放射性核素比率和浓度的可靠和可追溯的数据，特别是129I/127I，在环境样品中，如湖水、植物、表层土壤和总悬浮颗粒。这涉及通过验证的分析方法和遵循ISO认证程序来确保数据的准确性和完整性，从而全面了解这些高海拔地区放射性核素的分布及其潜在环境影响。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What are the procedural steps involved in ensuring the traceability and completeness of records when analyzing artificial radioactive nuclides in high-altitude regions?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 确保在高海拔地区分析人工放射性核素时记录的可追溯性和完整性所涉及的程序步骤有哪些？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: To ensure traceability and completeness of records in the analysis of artificial radioactive nuclides, samples collected from regions like Tibet and Qinghai undergo strict pre-processing and accelerator mass spectrometry measurement. Each step of the analysis follows a verified and reliable methodology for each nuclide. The process adheres to ISO laboratory and analysis method certification procedures, ensuring that every step, data point, and result is traceable and fully documented.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 为了确保对人工放射性核素分析记录的可追溯性和完整性，来自西藏和青海等地区的样品经过严格的预处理和加速器质谱测量。分析的每个步骤都遵循针对每种核素的经过验证和可靠的方法。该过程遵循ISO实验室和分析方法认证程序，确保每个步骤、数据点和结果都是可追溯的并且完全记录在案。

Enablement.QuestionEn: What analytical processes and technologies enable the reliable measurement of radionuclide concentrations in high-altitude regions such as Tibet and Qinghai?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 哪些分析过程和技术能够可靠地测量高海拔地区（如西藏和青海）中的放射性核素浓度？
Enablement.AnswerEn: The collection and analysis of radionuclide concentrations in high-altitude regions like Tibet and Qinghai are enabled by the use of accelerator mass spectrometry for precise measurement. Samples undergo pre-treatment, and the analysis follows a verified and reliable process for each radionuclide. This includes adherence to ISO laboratory and analytical method certification procedures, ensuring traceability and completeness of every step, data, and result.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 在高海拔地区如西藏和青海，利用加速器质谱法对放射性核素浓度的收集和分析得以实现，以进行精确测量。样品经过预处理，分析遵循经过验证和可靠的每种放射性核素的流程。这包括遵循ISO实验室和分析方法认证程序，确保每一步、每个数据和结果的可追溯性和完整性。
